bug.author: fifar
bug.summary: some mistakes in Paddle installation wiki of docker version
bug.description:
As mentioned in the <denchmark-link:http://www.paddlepaddle.org/doc_cn/build_and_install/install/docker_install.html>Chinese installation wiki</denchmark-link> , there are 6 docker images, such as . But from <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/paddledev/paddle/tags/>docker images repository</denchmark-link> , the useful ones are images like . So, command of Installing and Running docker image should be as follows, <denchmark-code>$ docker run -it paddledev/paddle:cpu-latest </denchmark-code>
Thanks.

comments.comment: We are aware of this. The doc in github repo has already been fixed. The documentation site wll be update soon.,
